testsuite.name: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: When enter Lesson name "Navbar Lesson"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And I click the new question button on the lesson design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And I create question "Formula Question" with label "Formula Question Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And I create a Mathematical Formula response area in the lesson question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: When I save & close the lesson on the design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And I save and close the lesson summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: Then the new lesson "Navbar Lesson" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And I click on the "Navbar Lesson" module in the "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: Then the module "Navbar Lesson" is opened without launch page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: When I resize the lesson width to "600" px
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: Then I see the lesson hamburger button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: When I click the lesson hamburger button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: Then I see the lesson navigation menu
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: When I click the lesson hamburger button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: Then I do not see the lesson navigation menu
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: When I resize the lesson width to "1200" px
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: Then I do not see the lesson hamburger button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: And I see the lesson navigation menu
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that the nav menu is collapsible
